scripts.build:main: cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack --config webpack.preload.js --mode development && cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack --config webpack.main.js --mode development
scripts.build: rm -rf ./dist && cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack --config webpack.preload.js --mode development && cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack --config webpack.main.js --mode development && cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack --config webpack.renderer.js --mode development
scripts.main: cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack --config webpack.preload.js --mode development && cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack --config webpack.main.js --mode development && electron .
